import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { ProductModel } from '../../../shared/products.model'; import { ProductService } from '../../../shared/products.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit { products$: Observable | undefined; constructor(private productService: ProductService) { } ngOnInit() { this.products$ = this.productService.getProducts(); } borrarProducto(id: string) { this.productService.deleteProduct(id).subscribe(data => { console.log(data); }); } }
